Pre-Game Insights: Analysts predict an interesting series between the New York Yankees and Chicago Cubs, with the first game taking place on September 6, 2024, at Wrigley Field.
The Yankees' recent form includes a series loss to the Texas Rangers, where they gave up 14 hits and surrendered three runs in both the fourth and sixth innings in their last game.
Luis Gil will start for the Yankees with a season record of 12-6 and a 3.39 ERA in 24 starts.
The Cubs recently played the Pittsburgh Pirates, losing the first two games but winning the finale with a 12-0 blowout.
Jordan Wicks will start for the Cubs with a season record of 2-2 and a 3.82 ERA in eight games.
